property.name: createVcfFileQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.vcf ( vcf_id, bio_data_item_id, reference_genome_id, index_id, compressed) VALUES ( :VCF_ID, :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID, :INDEX_ID, :COMPRESSED)

property.name: loadVcfFileQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.format, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
v.vcf_id, v.reference_genome_id as vcf_reference_genome_id, v.compressed as vcf_compressed,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.vcf v JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON v.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = v.index_id WHERE v.vcf_id = ?

property.name: loadVcfFilesQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.format, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
v.vcf_id, v.reference_genome_id as vcf_reference_genome_id, v.compressed as vcf_compressed,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.vcf v JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON v.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = v.index_id WHERE v.vcf_id IN @in@

property.name: createSamplesForFileQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.vcf_sample ( vcf_sample_id, vcf_id, sample_name, order_index) VALUES ( :VCF_SAMPLE_ID, :VCF_ID, :SAMPLE_NAME, :ORDER_INDEX)

property.name: loadSamplesForFileQuery
property.value: SELECT vcf_sample_id, sample_name, order_index FROM catgenome.vcf_sample WHERE vcf_id = ? ORDER BY order_index

property.name: loadSamplesByFileIdsQuery
property.value: SELECT s.vcf_sample_id, s.sample_name, s.order_index, s.vcf_id FROM catgenome.vcf_sample s WHERE s.vcf_id IN @in@ ORDER BY order_index
